name: Black Eye Spin
summary:
Black Eye Spin continues series of puzzle-multiplayer games.
Playing this game you have to spin the wheel and catch colored balls. 3 or more adjacent one color balls explode and create X balls. X balls create higher value X balls. Highest is black ball. We call it Black Eye. Wheel has only 16 slots. So it will be good exercise for your brain trying not to fill all the slots otherwise the game will end.
All created X balls will be collected and can be used in multiplayer game Black Eye World – another same series game.
